article_title: In reversal, Obama to allow canceled health plans

article_metadata.description: Bowing to pressure, President Barack Obama on Thursday announced changes to his health care law to give insurance companies the option to keep offering consumers plans that would otherwise be canceled.
article_metadata.title: In reversal, Obama to allow canceled health plans
